module.name: Voicemail
module.changelog: *12.0.20* pagination fixes *12.0.19* FREEPBX-8211 Improvements to UCP Voicemail/CDR Playback *12.0.18* Restructure Voicemail in UCP, FREEPBX-8198 Add pagination, FREEPBX-8207 fix converting process *12.0.17* Add res_mwi_devstate now for 12 installations *12.0.16* Tweaks for UCP *12.0.15* Stop playing voicemails in UCP when they are deleted *12.0.14* FREEPBX-7542 fixes UCP not renumbering voicemails *12.0.13* FREEPBX-7500 Make User voicemail settings uniform *12.0.12* FREEPBX-7326 fixes issue of enabling setting if module doesnt exist. *12.0.11* VmX Temp addition and Fixes and UCP conflict fixes *12.0.10* Part fix for #6923 language not being set. *12.0.9* Restructure Parts of UCP *12.0.8* Cleanup in UCP *12.0.7* Auto Saving for UCP *12.0.6* UCP Module Adjustments *12.0.5* Small fixes for UCP FREEPBX-7293 *12.0.4* Set message limit for UCP display *12.0.3* Work on GUI for button work in Framework, numerous changes and additions for User Control Panel on the backend *12.0.2* FREEPBX-6471 allow asterisk in password field *12.0.1* Use BMO object to add the Asterisk mwi module if it exists *12.0.0* Added back the ability to have an extension call voicemail and not have to enter a password, re FREEPBX-5323 *2.11.1.1* Fix #6967 (missing help popups) and PBXAC-12 (unable to delete greetings/recordings) *2.11.1.0* Reorganize and rework module. Clean up and fixed #6769 *2.11.0.4* #6712 *2.11.0.3* #6246 *2.11.0.2* #6111 *2.11.0.1* install_amp corner case error fix *2.11.0.0* #6015 *2.10.0.4* #5894 *2.10.0.3* #5639 *2.10.0.2* #5135, #5168 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.5* #5072 *2.9.0.4* #5036, #5062 *2.9.0.3* #5000 *2.9.0.2* #4401 *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* #4653, #4734, #4736, merge vmailadmin
module.description: This module allows you to configure Voicemail for a user or extension
